trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect.DataSource%2A>屬性可讓您將繫結<xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect>控制項實作的任何集合<xref:System.Collections.IEnumerable>或<xref:System.ComponentModel.IListSource>介面 (例如<xref:System.Data.DataView?displayProperty=nameWithType>， <xref:System.Collections.ArrayList?displayProperty=nameWithType>，或<xref:System.Collections.Generic.List%601?displayProperty=nameWithType>)。

trans-unit.source: When you use the <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect.DataSource%2A> property to specify the data source, you must explicitly call the <xref:System.Web.UI.Control.DataBind%2A> method to bind the control and its <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect.DataValueField%2A> property to the data source.
trans-unit.target: 當您使用<xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect.DataSource%2A>屬性來指定資料來源，您必須明確呼叫<xref:System.Web.UI.Control.DataBind%2A>方法，以將控制項繫結及其<xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect.DataValueField%2A>到資料來源的屬性。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect.DataSourceID%2A> property allows you to bind an <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect> control to a data source control that represents a data source.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect.DataSourceID%2A>屬性可讓您將繫結<xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect>代表資料來源的資料來源控制項的控制項。

trans-unit.source: When you use the <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect.DataSourceID%2A> property to specify the data source, the <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect> control and its <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect.DataValueField%2A> property automatically bind to the data source control.
trans-unit.target: 當您使用<xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect.DataSourceID%2A>屬性來指定資料來源，<xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect>控制項及其<xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect.DataValueField%2A>屬性自動繫結至資料來源控制項。

trans-unit.source: Therefore, you do not need to explicitly call the <xref:System.Web.UI.Control.DataBind%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 因此，您不需要明確地呼叫<xref:System.Web.UI.Control.DataBind%2A>方法。

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates how to use the <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect.DataSource%2A> and <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect.DataValueField%2A> properties to specify the field from the data source to bind to the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListItem.Value%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> property of each item in the <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect> control.
trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用<xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect.DataSource%2A>和<xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect.DataValueField%2A>屬性，以指定要繫結至資料來源欄位<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListItem.Value%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>屬性中的每個項目的<xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect>控制項。

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates how to use the <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect.DataSourceID%2A> and <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect.DataValueField%2A> properties to specify the field from the data source to bind to the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListItem.Value%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> property of each item in the <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect> control.
trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用<xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect.DataSourceID%2A>和<xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect.DataValueField%2A>屬性，以指定要繫結至資料來源欄位<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListItem.Value%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>屬性中的每個項目的<xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect>控制項。

trans-unit.source: Verifies that the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect" /> control requires data binding and that a valid data source control is specified before calling the <see cref="M:System.Web.UI.Control.DataBind" /> method.
trans-unit.target: 呼叫 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect" /> 方法之前，請先確認 <see cref="M:System.Web.UI.Control.DataBind" /> 控制項是否需要資料繫結，而且是否已指定有效的資料來源。

trans-unit.source: When you specify a value for the <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect.DataSourceID%2A> property, ASP.NET automatically binds the data listing control to the specified data source control.
trans-unit.target: 當您指定的值<xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect.DataSourceID%2A>屬性，ASP.NET 會自動將資料繫結清單的指定的資料來源控制項的控制項。

trans-unit.source: When ASP.NET performs data binding for the control, it calls the <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect.EnsureDataBound%2A> method first to verify that the control has not already been data-bound and that a valid data source control that implements the <xref:System.Web.UI.IDataSource> interface is specified for its <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect.DataSourceID%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 當 ASP.NET 執行資料繫結控制項時，它會呼叫<xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect.EnsureDataBound%2A>第一次，並確定控制項不已經過資料繫結，有效的資料來源控制項所實作的方法<xref:System.Web.UI.IDataSource>介面指定為其<xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect.DataSourceID%2A>屬性。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect.EnsureDataBound%2A> method then calls the <xref:System.Web.UI.Control.DataBind%2A> method to ensure that the control is data-bound immediately after the call to this method.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect.EnsureDataBound%2A>方法接著呼叫<xref:System.Web.UI.Control.DataBind%2A>方法，以確保該控制項是資料繫結至這個方法呼叫之後立即。

trans-unit.source: Gets an <see cref="T:System.Collections.IEnumerable" /> object that represents the data source that is bound to the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect" /> control.
trans-unit.target: 取得 <see cref="T:System.Collections.IEnumerable" /> 物件，表示繫結至 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect" /> 控制項的資料來源。

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.Collections.IEnumerable" /> object.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Collections.IEnumerable" /> 物件。

trans-unit.source: If no data source is specified, a default value of <see langword="null" /> is returned.
trans-unit.target: 如果沒有指定資料來源，則傳回 <see langword="null" /> 的預設值。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect.GetData%2A> method returns an <xref:System.Collections.IEnumerable> object independent of whether the data source was specified by the <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect.DataSource%2A> property or the <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect.DataSourceID%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect.GetData%2A>方法會傳回<xref:System.Collections.IEnumerable>獨立於資料來源依指定的物件<xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect.DataSource%2A>屬性或<xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect.DataSourceID%2A>屬性。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="P:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect.DataSourceID" /> property is not of type <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.IDataSource" />.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="P:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect.DataSourceID" /> 屬性的型別不是 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.IDataSource" />。

trans-unit.source: \- or -
The <see cref="P:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect.DataSourceID" /> property is not of type <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.IHierarchicalDataSource" />.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="P:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect.DataSourceID" /> 屬性的型別不是 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.IHierarchicalDataSource" />。

trans-unit.source: Both a <see cref="P:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect.DataSource" /> and a <see cref="P:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect.DataSourceID" /> property are defined for the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect" /> control.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="P:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect.DataSource" /> 控制項的 <see cref="P:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect.DataSourceID" /> 和 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect" /> 屬性都會定義。

trans-unit.source: \- or -
The requested data view cannot be found.
trans-unit.target: 找不到要求的資料檢視。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the content between the opening and closing tags of the control without automatically converting special characters to their equivalent HTML entities.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定控制項的開頭和結尾標記之間的內容，而不須自動將特殊字元轉換為對等的 HTML 實體 (Entity)。

trans-unit.source: This property is not supported for this control.
trans-unit.target: 這個控制項不支援這個屬性。

trans-unit.source: The content between the opening and closing tags of the control.
trans-unit.target: 控制項的開頭和結尾標記之間的內容。

trans-unit.source: Do not read from or assign a value to this property.
trans-unit.target: 請勿從讀取或將值指派給這個屬性。

trans-unit.source: Otherwise, a <xref:System.NotSupportedException?displayProperty=nameWithType> exception is thrown.
trans-unit.target: 否則會擲回 <xref:System.NotSupportedException?displayProperty=nameWithType> 例外狀況。

trans-unit.source: This property is inherited from the <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlContainerControl> class and is not applicable to the <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect> class.
trans-unit.target: 這個屬性繼承自<xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlContainerControl>類別，並不適用於<xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect>類別。

trans-unit.source: An attempt is made to read from or assign a value to this property.
trans-unit.target: 嘗試自這個屬性讀取值，或指派值給這個屬性。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the content between the opening and closing tags of the control with automatic conversion of special characters to their equivalent HTML entities.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定控制項的開頭和結尾標記之間的內容，且自動將特殊字元轉換為對等的 HTML 實體。

trans-unit.source: This property is not supported for this control.
trans-unit.target: 這個控制項不支援這個屬性。

trans-unit.source: The content between the opening and closing tags of the control.
trans-unit.target: 控制項的開頭和結尾標記之間的內容。

trans-unit.source: Do not read from or assign a value to this property.
trans-unit.target: 請勿從讀取或將值指派給這個屬性。

trans-unit.source: Otherwise, a <xref:System.NotSupportedException?displayProperty=nameWithType> exception is thrown.
trans-unit.target: 否則會擲回 <xref:System.NotSupportedException?displayProperty=nameWithType> 例外狀況。

trans-unit.source: This property is inherited from the <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlContainerControl> class and is not applicable to the <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect> class.
trans-unit.target: 這個屬性繼承自<xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlContainerControl>類別，並不適用於<xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect>類別。

trans-unit.source: An attempt is made to read from or assign a value to this property.
trans-unit.target: 嘗試自這個屬性讀取值，或指派值給這個屬性。

trans-unit.source: Gets a value indicating whether a <see cref="P:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect.DataSourceID" /> property is defined for the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect" /> control.
trans-unit.target: 取得值，指出是否已為 <see cref="P:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect.DataSourceID" /> 控制項定義 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect" /> 屬性。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if a data source control is defined; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果已定義資料來源控制項，則為 <see langword="true" />，否則為 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: If the length of the string representing the <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect.DataSourceID%2A> property string is greater than zero, then <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect.IsBoundUsingDataSourceID%2A> returns `true`.
trans-unit.target: 如果長度的字串表示<xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect.DataSourceID%2A>屬性字串是大於零，則<xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect.IsBoundUsingDataSourceID%2A>傳回`true`。

trans-unit.source: Gets a collection that contains the items listed in an <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect" /> control.
trans-unit.target: 取得一個含有 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect" /> 控制項中所列示項目的集合。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListItemCollection" /> that contains the items listed in an <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect" /> control.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListItemCollection" />，其中含有 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect" /> 控制項中所列示的項目。

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect.Items%2A> collection to manage the items listed in the <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect> control.
trans-unit.target: 使用<xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect.Items%2A>要管理列中的項目集合<xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect>控制項。

trans-unit.source: You can programmatically add items to, remove items from, and insert items into the collection.
trans-unit.target: 您可以程式設計方式加入要移除項目，並將項目插入至集合的項目。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect.Items%2A> collection is commonly used to iterate through the items in the <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect> control.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect.Items%2A>集合通常用來逐一查看中的項目<xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect>控制項。

trans-unit.source: For example, when multiple items are selected, you can iterate through the <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect.Items%2A> collection to determine which items are selected.
trans-unit.target: 例如，多個選取項目時，您可以逐一<xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect.Items%2A>來決定選取哪一個項目集合。

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates how to use the <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect.Items%2A> collection to iterate through the items in the <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect> control and determine which items are selected.
trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用<xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect.Items%2A>集合來逐一查看中的項目<xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect>控制，並決定選取哪一個項目。

trans-unit.source: The key identifier for the control.
trans-unit.target: 控制項的索引鍵識別項。

trans-unit.source: The collection of all incoming name values.
trans-unit.target: 所有內送名稱值的集合。

trans-unit.source: Processes the postback data for the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect" /> control.
trans-unit.target: 處理 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect" /> 控制項的回傳資料。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect" /> control's state has changed as a result of a postback; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果回傳的結果改變了 <see langword="true" /> 控制項的狀態，則為 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect" />，否則為 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect.LoadPostData%2A> method checks whether the postback data of the <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect> control is different from its previous value, and if so, returns `true`.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect.LoadPostData%2A>方法會檢查是否在回傳資料的<xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect>控制項不同於先前的值，以及如果是的話，會傳回`true`。

trans-unit.source: If the <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect> control's <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect.Multiple%2A> property is `false`, indicating a single-selection <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect> control, then the <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect.LoadPostData%2A> method checks the <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect.SelectedIndex%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 如果<xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect>控制項的<xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect.Multiple%2A>屬性是`false`，表示單一選取<xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect>控制項，然後在<xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect.LoadPostData%2A>方法會檢查<xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect.SelectedIndex%2A>屬性。

trans-unit.source: If the <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect> control's <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect.Multiple%2A> property is `true`, indicating a multiple-selection <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect> control, then the <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect.LoadPostData%2A> method checks the <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect.SelectedIndices%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 如果<xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect>控制項的<xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect.Multiple%2A>屬性是`true`，指出多個選取項目<xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect>控制項，然後在<xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect.LoadPostData%2A>方法會檢查<xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect.SelectedIndices%2A>屬性。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect.LoadPostData%2A> method is used primarily by control developers extending the functionality of the <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect> control.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect.LoadPostData%2A>主要由控制項開發人員擴充功能的使用方法<xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect>控制項。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="P:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect.SelectedIndex" /> property was set to a value greater than the number of items in the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect" /> control or less than <see langword="-1" />.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="P:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect.SelectedIndex" /> 屬性設定為大於 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect" /> 控制項中項目數的值，或小於 <see langword="-1" /> 的值。

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.Object" /> that represents the control state to be restored.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Object" />，代表所要還原的控制項狀態。

trans-unit.source: Restores the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect" /> control's view state information from a previous page request that was saved by the <see cref="M:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect.SaveViewState" /> method.
trans-unit.target: 從 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect" /> 方法所儲存的上一頁要求中，還原 <see cref="M:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect.SaveViewState" /> 控制項的檢視狀態資訊。

trans-unit.source: This method is used primarily by the .NET Framework infrastructure and is not intended to be used directly from your code.
trans-unit.target: 這個方法主要供.NET Framework 基礎結構，並不是直接從您的程式碼使用。

trans-unit.source: However, control developers can override this method to specify how a custom server control restores its view state.
trans-unit.target: 不過，控制項開發人員可以覆寫這個方法，以指定自訂的伺服器控制項如何還原其檢視狀態。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [ASP.NET State Management Overview](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/0218d965-5d30-445b-b6a6-8870e70e63ce).
trans-unit.target: 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[ASP.NET 狀態管理概觀](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/0218d965-5d30-445b-b6a6-8870e70e63ce)。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect> control's view state is stored as a <xref:System.Web.UI.Triplet> object.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect>控制項的檢視狀態儲存為<xref:System.Web.UI.Triplet>物件。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.Triplet.First> field of the <xref:System.Web.UI.Triplet> object holds the <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect> control's base view state.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.Triplet.First>欄位<xref:System.Web.UI.Triplet>物件保存<xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect>控制項的基底的檢視狀態。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.Triplet.Second> field of the <xref:System.Web.UI.Triplet> object holds the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListItemCollection> collection represented by the <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect.Items%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.Triplet.Second>欄位<xref:System.Web.UI.Triplet>物件保存<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListItemCollection>集合由<xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect.Items%2A>屬性。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.Triplet.Third> field of the <xref:System.Web.UI.Triplet> object holds the selected indices represented by the <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect.SelectedIndices%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.Triplet.Third>欄位<xref:System.Web.UI.Triplet>物件會保存由所選取的索引<xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect.SelectedIndices%2A>屬性。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect.LoadViewState%2A> method calls the base class's <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlContainerControl.LoadViewState%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> method to restore the control's base view state.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect.LoadViewState%2A>方法會呼叫基底類別的<xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlContainerControl.LoadViewState%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>方法還原控制項的基底的檢視狀態。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect.LoadViewState%2A> method is used primarily by control developers extending the functionality of the <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect> control.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect.LoadViewState%2A>主要由控制項開發人員擴充功能的使用方法<xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect>控制項。

trans-unit.source: When overriding <see cref="M:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect.LoadViewState(System.Object)" /> in a derived class, be sure to call the base class's <see cref="M:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect.LoadViewState(System.Object)" /> method so that the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect" /> control's view state is properly managed.
trans-unit.target: 在覆寫<see cref="M:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect.LoadViewState(System.Object)" />在衍生類別中，請務必呼叫基底類別的<see cref="M:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect.LoadViewState(System.Object)" />方法以便<see cref="T:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect" />正確管理控制項的檢視狀態。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value indicating whether multiple items can be selected concurrently in the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect" /> control.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定值，指出是否可以同時選取 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect" /> 控制項中的多個項目。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if multiple items can be concurrently selected in the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect" /> control; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果可以同時選取 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect" /> 控制項中的多個項目，則為 <see langword="true" />；否則，即為 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: The default value is <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 預設值是 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect.Multiple%2A> property to specify whether multiple items can be concurrently selected in the <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect> control.
trans-unit.target: 使用<xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect.Multiple%2A>屬性來指定是否可以在同時選取多個項目<xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect>控制項。

trans-unit.source: By default, the <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect> control is displayed as a drop-down list box.
trans-unit.target: 根據預設，<xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect>控制項顯示為下拉式清單方塊。

trans-unit.source: If you allow multiple selections (by setting the <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect.Multiple%2A> property to `true`) or specify a height greater than one row (by setting the <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect.Size%2A> property to a value greater than `1`), the control is displayed as a list box.
trans-unit.target: 如果您允許多重選取 (藉由設定<xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect.Multiple%2A>屬性`true`) 或指定大於一個資料列的高度 (藉由設定<xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect.Size%2A>屬性設為大於值`1`)，顯示為清單方塊控制項。

trans-unit.source: To determine the selected items in an <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect> control that allows multiple simultaneous selections, iterate through the <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect.Items%2A> collection and test the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListItem.Selected%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> property of each item.
trans-unit.target: 若要判斷在選取的項目<xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect>逐一查看控制項可讓多個同時選取項目，<xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect.Items%2A>收集和測試<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListItem.Selected%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>每個項目的屬性。

trans-unit.source: The `multiple` attribute is rendered in the <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect> control only if this property is set to `true`.
trans-unit.target: `multiple`屬性呈現在<xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect>控制只有當這個屬性設定為`true`。

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates how to use the <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect.Multiple%2A> property to specify whether multiple items can be selected in the <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect> control.
trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用<xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect.Multiple%2A>屬性來指定多個項目是否可以選取在<xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect>控制項。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the unique identifier name associated with the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect" /> control.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定與 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect" /> 控制項相關的唯一識別項名稱。

trans-unit.source: The unique identifier name associated with the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect" /> control.
trans-unit.target: 與 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect" /> 控制項相關的唯一識別項名稱。

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect.Name%2A> property to determine the unique identifier name for an <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect> control.
trans-unit.target: 使用<xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect.Name%2A>屬性來判斷唯一識別項名稱<xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect>控制項。

trans-unit.source: In this implementation, the `get` accessor returns the value of the <xref:System.Web.UI.Control.UniqueID%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> property.
trans-unit.target: 在此實作中，`get`存取子會傳回的值<xref:System.Web.UI.Control.UniqueID%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>屬性。

trans-unit.source: However, the `set` accessor does not assign a value to this property.
trans-unit.target: 不過，`set`存取子不會指派給這個屬性的值。

trans-unit.source: The `set` accessor does not assign a value to this property because the <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect.Name%2A> property must have the same value as the <xref:System.Web.UI.Control.UniqueID%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> property for the <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect> control to work properly.
trans-unit.target: `set`存取子不會指派值給這個屬性因為<xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect.Name%2A>屬性必須有相同的值<xref:System.Web.UI.Control.UniqueID%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>屬性<xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect>才能正常運作的控制項。

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates how to use the <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect.Name%2A> property of the <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect> control to select a specific item in the <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect.Items%2A> list.
trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用<xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect.Name%2A>屬性<xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect>控制項以選取特定的項目中<xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect.Items%2A>清單。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.EventArgs" /> that contains the event data.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.EventArgs" />，其中包含事件資料。

trans-unit.source: Raises the <see cref="E:System.Web.UI.Control.DataBinding" /> event of an <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect" /> control.
trans-unit.target: 引發 <see cref="E:System.Web.UI.Control.DataBinding" /> 控制項的 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect" /> 事件。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.Control.DataBinding> event is raised when data is bound to the <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect> control.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.Control.DataBinding>繫結至資料時，就會引發事件<xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect>控制項。

trans-unit.source: This method notifies the control to perform any data-binding logic that is associated with it.
trans-unit.target: 這個方法會通知控制項執行與它相關聯的任何資料繫結邏輯。

trans-unit.source: Specifically, the <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect.OnDataBinding%2A> method creates the <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect.Items%2A> collection from the data source specified in either the <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect.DataSource%2A> property or the <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect.DataSourceID%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 具體來說，<xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect.OnDataBinding%2A>方法會建立<xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect.Items%2A>從資料來源中指定的集合<xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect.DataSource%2A>屬性或<xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect.DataSourceID%2A>屬性。

trans-unit.source: Raising an event invokes the event handler through a delegate.
trans-unit.target: 引發事件會透過委派叫用此事件處理常式。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Handling and Raising Events](~/docs/standard/events/index.md).
trans-unit.target: 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[處理和引發事件](~/docs/standard/events/index.md)。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect.OnDataBinding%2A> method also allows derived classes to handle the event without attaching a delegate.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect.OnDataBinding%2A> 方法也允許衍生類別處理事件，而不用附加委派。

trans-unit.source: This is the preferred technique for handling the event in a derived class.
trans-unit.target: 這是在衍生類別中處理事件的慣用技巧。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="P:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect.DataSourceID" /> property is not of type <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.IDataSource" />.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="P:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect.DataSourceID" /> 屬性的型別不是 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.IDataSource" />。

trans-unit.source: \- or -
The <see cref="P:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect.DataSourceID" /> property is not of type <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.IHierarchicalDataSource" />.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="P:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect.DataSourceID" /> 屬性的型別不是 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.IHierarchicalDataSource" />。

trans-unit.source: Both a <see cref="P:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect.DataSource" /> and a <see cref="P:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect.DataSourceID" /> property are defined for the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect" /> control.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="P:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect.DataSource" /> 控制項的 <see cref="P:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect.DataSourceID" /> 和 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect" /> 屬性都會定義。

trans-unit.source: \- or -
The requested data view cannot be found.
trans-unit.target: 找不到要求的資料檢視。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="P:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect.SelectedIndex" /> property was set to a value greater than the number of items in the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect" /> control or less than <see langword="-1" />.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="P:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect.SelectedIndex" /> 屬性設定為大於 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect" /> 控制項中項目數的值，或小於 <see langword="-1" /> 的值。

trans-unit.source: When overriding the <see cref="M:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect.OnDataBinding(System.EventArgs)" /> method in a derived class, be sure to call the base class's <see cref="M:System.Web.UI.Control.OnDataBinding(System.EventArgs)" /> method so that registered delegates receive the event.
trans-unit.target: 在覆寫<see cref="M:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect.OnDataBinding(System.EventArgs)" />方法在衍生類別中，請務必呼叫基底類別的<see cref="M:System.Web.UI.Control.OnDataBinding(System.EventArgs)" />方法，使已註冊的委派能接收到事件。

trans-unit.source: Invoked when the <see cref="P:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect.DataSource" />, <see cref="P:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect.DataMember" />, or <see cref="P:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect.DataSourceID" /> property is changed.
trans-unit.target: 在 <see cref="P:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect.DataSource" />、<see cref="P:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect.DataMember" /> 或 <see cref="P:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect.DataSourceID" /> 屬性變更時叫用。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect.OnDataPropertyChanged%2A> method sets the <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect.RequiresDataBinding%2A> property to `true` if the <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect.DataSource%2A>, <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect.DataMember%2A>, or <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect.DataSourceID%2A> property has changed.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect.OnDataPropertyChanged%2A>方法會設定<xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect.RequiresDataBinding%2A>屬性`true`如果<xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect.DataSource%2A>， <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect.DataMember%2A>，或<xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect.DataSourceID%2A>屬性已變更。

trans-unit.source: An attempt was made to change the property value during the data-binding phase of the control.
trans-unit.target: 嘗試在控制項的資料繫結 (Data Binding) 階段變更此屬性值。

trans-unit.source: The source of the event.
trans-unit.target: 事件的來源。

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.EventArgs" /> that contains the event data.
trans-unit.target: 包含事件資料的 <see cref="T:System.EventArgs" />。

trans-unit.source: Invoked when the <see cref="P:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect.DataSource" />, <see cref="P:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect.DataMember" />, or <see cref="P:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect.DataSourceID" /> property is changed.
trans-unit.target: 在 <see cref="P:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect.DataSource" />、<see cref="P:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect.DataMember" /> 或 <see cref="P:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect.DataSourceID" /> 屬性變更時叫用。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect.OnDataSourceViewChanged%2A> method sets the <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect.RequiresDataBinding%2A> property to `true`.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect.OnDataSourceViewChanged%2A>方法會設定<xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect.RequiresDataBinding%2A>屬性`true`。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.EventArgs" /> that contains the event data.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.EventArgs" />，其中包含事件資料。

trans-unit.source: Raises the <see cref="E:System.Web.UI.Control.Init" /> event for the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect" /> control.
trans-unit.target: 引發 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect" /> 控制項的 <see cref="E:System.Web.UI.Control.Init" /> 事件。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect.OnInit%2A> method notifies the <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect> control to perform any initialization steps that are required to create and set up an instance.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect.OnInit%2A>方法會通知<xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect>執行任何初始設定步驟建立及設定執行個體所需的控制項。

trans-unit.source: If the <xref:System.Web.UI.Control.IsViewStateEnabled%2A> property is `false` and the <xref:System.Web.UI.Page.IsPostBack%2A> property is `true`, then the <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect.RequiresDataBinding%2A> property is set to `true`.
trans-unit.target: 如果<xref:System.Web.UI.Control.IsViewStateEnabled%2A>屬性是`false`和<xref:System.Web.UI.Page.IsPostBack%2A>屬性是`true`，然後在<xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect.RequiresDataBinding%2A>屬性設定為`true`。

trans-unit.source: When overriding the <see cref="M:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect.OnInit(System.EventArgs)" /> method in a derived class, be sure to call the base class's <see cref="M:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect.OnInit(System.EventArgs)" /> method so that the registered delegates received the event.
trans-unit.target: 在覆寫<see cref="M:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect.OnInit(System.EventArgs)" />方法在衍生類別中，請務必呼叫基底類別的<see cref="M:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect.OnInit(System.EventArgs)" />方法，讓已註冊的委派能接收到事件。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.EventArgs" /> that contains the event data.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.EventArgs" />，其中包含事件資料。

trans-unit.source: Raises the <see cref="E:System.Web.UI.Control.Load" /> event for the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect" /> control.
trans-unit.target: 引發 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect" /> 控制項的 <see cref="E:System.Web.UI.Control.Load" /> 事件。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect.OnLoad%2A> method notifies the <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect> control that it should perform actions common to each HTTP request for the page it is associated with.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect.OnLoad%2A>方法會通知<xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect>控制它應執行通用的每個 HTTP 要求的動作相關聯的頁面。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect.OnLoad%2A> method connects the <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect> control to the appropriate data source specified in either the <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect.DataSource%2A> property or the <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect.DataSourceID%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect.OnLoad%2A>方法連接<xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect>適當的資料來源中指定的控制項<xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect.DataSource%2A>屬性或<xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect.DataSourceID%2A>屬性。

trans-unit.source: If the <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect.DataSourceID%2A> property is to specify the data source control that the <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect> control should use to retrieve its data source, then the <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect.OnDataSourceViewChanged%2A> method is set as the event handler.
trans-unit.target: 如果<xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect.DataSourceID%2A>屬性是指定資料來源控制項<xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect>控制項應該使用要擷取其資料來源，然後在<xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect.OnDataSourceViewChanged%2A>方法設定為事件處理常式。

trans-unit.source: The ID specified in the <see cref="P:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect.DataSourceID" /> property cannot be found.
trans-unit.target: 找不到 <see cref="P:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect.DataSourceID" /> 屬性中指定的 ID。

trans-unit.source: \- or -
The control specified in the <see cref="P:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect.DataSourceID" /> property is not of the type <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.IDataSource" />.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="P:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect.DataSourceID" /> 屬性中指定的控制項不是 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.IDataSource" /> 型別。

trans-unit.source: The data source cannot be resolved because a value is specified for both the <see cref="P:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect.DataSource" /> property and the <see cref="P:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect.DataSourceID" /> property.
trans-unit.target: 無法解析資料來源，因為同時為 <see cref="P:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect.DataSource" /> 屬性和 <see cref="P:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect.DataSourceID" /> 屬性指定了值。

trans-unit.source: \- or -
The requested <see cref="P:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect.DataMember" /> property could not be found.
trans-unit.target: 找不到所要求的 <see cref="P:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect.DataMember" /> 屬性。

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.EventArgs" /> that contains the event data.
trans-unit.target: 包含事件資料的 <see cref="T:System.EventArgs" />。

trans-unit.source: Raises the <see cref="E:System.Web.UI.Control.PreRender" /> event for the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect" /> control.
trans-unit.target: 引發 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect" /> 控制項的 <see cref="E:System.Web.UI.Control.PreRender" /> 事件。

trans-unit.source: If the <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect.Size%2A> property is greater than 1, then the <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect.OnPreRender%2A> method registers the <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect> control with the <xref:System.Web.UI.Page> control as one that requires postback processing.
trans-unit.target: 如果<xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect.Size%2A>屬性大於 1，則<xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect.OnPreRender%2A>方法暫存器<xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect>用來控制<xref:System.Web.UI.Page>為需要處理回傳的控制項。

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates how to override the <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect.OnPreRender%2A> method so that it allows multiple selections in a custom <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect> server control.
trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼範例示範如何覆寫<xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect.OnPreRender%2A>方法，使它允許多重選取自訂<xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect>伺服器控制項。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.EventArgs" /> that contains the event data.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.EventArgs" />，其中包含事件資料。

trans-unit.source: Raises the <see cref="E:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect.ServerChange" /> event of the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect" /> control.
trans-unit.target: 引發 <see cref="E:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect.ServerChange" /> 控制項的 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect" /> 事件。

trans-unit.source: This allows you to provide a custom handler for the event.
trans-unit.target: 這個方法可讓您提供該事件的自訂處理常式。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect.ServerChange> event is raised when the selected items in the <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect> control change between posts to the server.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect.ServerChange>就會引發事件時選取的項目中<xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect>控制發佈至伺服器之間的變更。

trans-unit.source: This event is raised only when the user initiates a post to the server, such as by clicking a Submit button.
trans-unit.target: 只有當使用者回傳至伺服器，例如起始送出按鈕，即可時，會引發這個事件。

trans-unit.source: This event does not cause a post to the server to occur.
trans-unit.target: 這個事件不會發佈至伺服器。

trans-unit.source: The control must have view state enabled for the <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect.ServerChange> event to work correctly.
trans-unit.target: 控制項必須具有啟用檢視狀態<xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect.ServerChange>事件才能正確運作。

trans-unit.source: You can use this event to perform data validation on the <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect> control when the user changes the selection in the control.
trans-unit.target: 您可以使用這個事件來執行資料驗證<xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect>控制當使用者變更控制項中的選取項目。

trans-unit.source: Raising an event invokes the event handler through a delegate.
trans-unit.target: 引發事件會透過委派叫用此事件處理常式。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Handling and Raising Events](~/docs/standard/events/index.md).
trans-unit.target: 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[處理和引發事件](~/docs/standard/events/index.md)。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect.OnServerChange%2A> method also allows derived classes to handle the event without attaching a delegate.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect.OnServerChange%2A> 方法也允許衍生類別處理事件，而不用附加委派。

trans-unit.source: This is the preferred technique for handling the event in a derived class.
trans-unit.target: 這是在衍生類別中處理事件的慣用技巧。

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates how to specify and code an event handler for the <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect.ServerChange> event of the <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect> control.
trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼範例示範如何指定及程式碼的事件處理常式<xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect.ServerChange>事件<xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect>控制項。

trans-unit.source: The event handler determines whether the selected items are compatible with each other.
trans-unit.target: 此事件處理常式會判斷選取的項目是否彼此相容。

trans-unit.source: When overriding the <see cref="M:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect.OnServerChange(System.EventArgs)" /> method in a derived class, be sure to call the base class's <see cref="M:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect.OnServerChange(System.EventArgs)" /> method so that registered delegates receive the event.
trans-unit.target: 在覆寫<see cref="M:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect.OnServerChange(System.EventArgs)" />方法在衍生類別中，請務必呼叫基底類別的<see cref="M:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect.OnServerChange(System.EventArgs)" />方法，使已註冊的委派能接收到事件。

trans-unit.source: Calls the <see cref="M:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect.OnServerChange(System.EventArgs)" /> method to signal the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect" /> control that the state of the control has changed.
trans-unit.target: 呼叫 <see cref="M:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect.OnServerChange(System.EventArgs)" /> 方法以通知 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect" /> 控制項，表示控制項的狀態已變更。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect.RaisePostDataChangedEvent%2A> method is used primarily by control developers extending the functionality of the <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect> control.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect.RaisePostDataChangedEvent%2A>主要由控制項開發人員擴充功能的使用方法<xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect>控制項。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.HtmlTextWriter" /> that receives the rendered content.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.HtmlTextWriter" /> 接收轉譯的內容。

trans-unit.source: Renders the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect" /> control's attributes to the specified <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.HtmlTextWriter" /> object.
trans-unit.target: 將 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect" /> 控制項的屬性轉譯為指定的 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.HtmlTextWriter" /> 物件。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect.RenderAttributes%2A> method renders the `name` attribute of the <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect> control directly to ensure that it has the same value as the <xref:System.Web.UI.Control.UniqueID%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> property.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect.RenderAttributes%2A>方法呈現`name`屬性<xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect>控制項直接以確認它有相同的值<xref:System.Web.UI.Control.UniqueID%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>屬性。

trans-unit.source: After rendering the attribute, the <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect.RenderAttributes%2A> method calls the base class's <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlContainerControl.RenderAttributes%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 在轉譯的屬性之後,<xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect.RenderAttributes%2A>方法會呼叫基底類別的<xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlContainerControl.RenderAttributes%2A>方法。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect.RenderAttributes%2A> method is used primarily by control developers extending the functionality of the <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect> control.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect.RenderAttributes%2A>主要由控制項開發人員擴充功能的使用方法<xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect>控制項。

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates how to override the <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect.RenderAttributes%2A> method in a custom server control so that specific title text is always displayed for the <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect> control.
trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼範例示範如何覆寫<xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect.RenderAttributes%2A>方法中的自訂伺服器控制項，以便指定標題文字一律會顯示為<xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect>控制項。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.HtmlTextWriter" /> that receives the rendered content.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.HtmlTextWriter" /> 接收轉譯的內容。

trans-unit.source: Renders the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect" /> control's child controls to the specified <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.HtmlTextWriter" /> object.
trans-unit.target: 將 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect" /> 控制項的子控制項呈現為指定的 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.HtmlTextWriter" /> 物件。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect.RenderChildren%2A> method overrides the base class's <xref:System.Web.UI.Control.RenderChildren%2A> method without calling the base method.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect.RenderChildren%2A>方法會覆寫基底類別的<xref:System.Web.UI.Control.RenderChildren%2A>方法，而不呼叫基底的方法。

trans-unit.source: Each of the `<option>` elements between the opening and closing `<select>` tags is rendered with a `value` attribute, a `selected` attribute if the item is selected, and its associated text.
trans-unit.target: 每個`<option>`開頭和結尾之間的項目`<select>`標記以呈現`value`屬性`selected`屬性，如果選取項目，以及其相關聯的文字。

trans-unit.source: If multiple items were selected but the <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect.Multiple%2A> property is set to `false`, then an <xref:System.Web.HttpException> exception is thrown.
trans-unit.target: 如果已選取多個項目，但<xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect.Multiple%2A>屬性設定為`false`，則<xref:System.Web.HttpException>擲回例外狀況。

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates how to override the <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect.RenderChildren%2A> method so that it always displays default option text in a custom <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect> server control.
trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼範例示範如何覆寫<xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect.RenderChildren%2A>方法，使它永遠都會顯示自訂預設選項文字<xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect>伺服器控制項。

trans-unit.source: Multiple items were selected but the <see cref="P:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect.Multiple" /> property is set to <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 已選取多個項目，但是 <see cref="P:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect.Multiple" /> 屬性設定為 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value indicating whether the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect" /> control needs to bind to its specified data source.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定值，指出 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect" /> 控制項是否需要繫結至其指定的資料來源。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the control needs to bind to a data source; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果控制項需要繫結至資料來源，則為 <see langword="true" />，否則為 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect> control uses the <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect.RequiresDataBinding%2A> property to determine whether the control needs to call the <xref:System.Web.UI.Control.DataBind%2A> method to bind to its specified data source.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect>控制使用<xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect.RequiresDataBinding%2A>屬性，以判斷控制項是否需要呼叫<xref:System.Web.UI.Control.DataBind%2A>繫結至其指定的資料來源的方法。

trans-unit.source: Each time the `set` accessor is called on either the <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect.DataSource%2A>, <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect.DataSourceID%2A>, or <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect.DataMember%2A> property to change the data source after the <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect.OnInit%2A> method has already been called, ASP.NET automatically sets the value of the <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect.RequiresDataBinding%2A> property to `true`.
trans-unit.target: 每次`set`上呼叫存取子<xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect.DataSource%2A>， <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect.DataSourceID%2A>，或<xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect.DataMember%2A>屬性來變更資料來源之後<xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect.OnInit%2A>呼叫方法，ASP.NET 會自動設定的值<xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect.RequiresDataBinding%2A>屬性`true`。

trans-unit.source: The value of the <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect.RequiresDataBinding%2A> property is also set to `true` when the <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect.OnDataPropertyChanged%2A> method is invoked.
trans-unit.target: 值<xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect.RequiresDataBinding%2A>屬性也會設為`true`時<xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect.OnDataPropertyChanged%2A>叫用方法。

trans-unit.source: ASP.NET automatically sets the value of the <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect.RequiresDataBinding%2A> property to `false` immediately after the <xref:System.Web.UI.Control.DataBind%2A> method has been called.
trans-unit.target: ASP.NET 會自動設定的值<xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect.RequiresDataBinding%2A>屬性`false`之後立即<xref:System.Web.UI.Control.DataBind%2A>呼叫方法。

trans-unit.source: Saves any <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect" /> control view state changes that have occurred since the page was posted back to the server.
trans-unit.target: 儲存自從網頁回傳至伺服器以來所發生的任何 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect" /> 控制項檢視狀態變更。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Object" /> that contains the changes to the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect" /> view state.
trans-unit.target: 包含 <see cref="T:System.Object" /> 檢視狀態變更的 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect" />。

trans-unit.source: If no view state is associated with the object, this method returns a null reference (<see langword="Nothing" /> in Visual Basic).
trans-unit.target: 如果檢視狀態與物件產生關聯，這個方法就會傳回 null 參考 (在 Visual Basic 中為 <see langword="Nothing" />)。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect> control's view state is stored as a <xref:System.Web.UI.Triplet> object.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect>控制項的檢視狀態儲存為<xref:System.Web.UI.Triplet>物件。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.Triplet.First> field of the <xref:System.Web.UI.Triplet> object holds the <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect> control's base view state.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.Triplet.First>欄位<xref:System.Web.UI.Triplet>物件保存<xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect>控制項的基底的檢視狀態。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.Triplet.Second> field of the <xref:System.Web.UI.Triplet> object holds the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListItemCollection> collection represented by the <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect.Items%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.Triplet.Second>欄位<xref:System.Web.UI.Triplet>物件保存<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListItemCollection>集合由<xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect.Items%2A>屬性。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.Triplet.Third> field of the <xref:System.Web.UI.Triplet> object holds the selected indices represented by the <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect.SelectedIndices%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.Triplet.Third>欄位<xref:System.Web.UI.Triplet>物件會保存由所選取的索引<xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect.SelectedIndices%2A>屬性。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect.SaveViewState%2A> method calls the base class's <xref:System.Web.UI.Control.SaveViewState%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> method to save the control's base view state.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect.SaveViewState%2A>方法會呼叫基底類別的<xref:System.Web.UI.Control.SaveViewState%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>方法來儲存控制項的基底的檢視狀態。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect.SaveViewState%2A> method is used primarily by control developers extending the functionality of the <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect> control.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect.SaveViewState%2A>主要由控制項開發人員擴充功能的使用方法<xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect>控制項。

trans-unit.source: When overriding <see cref="M:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect.SaveViewState" /> in a derived class, be sure to call the base class's <see cref="M:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect.SaveViewState" /> method so that the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect" /> control's view state is properly managed.
trans-unit.target: 在覆寫<see cref="M:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect.SaveViewState" />在衍生類別中，請務必呼叫基底類別的<see cref="M:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect.SaveViewState" />方法以便<see cref="T:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect" />正確管理控制項的檢視狀態。

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.Array" /> of type <see cref="T:System.Int32" /> that contains the items to select.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Array" /> 型別的 <see cref="T:System.Int32" />，其中含有要選取的項目。

trans-unit.source: Selects multiple items of the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect" /> control's <see cref="P:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect.Items" /> collection.
trans-unit.target: 選取 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect" /> 控制項 <see cref="P:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect.Items" /> 集合中的多個項目。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect.Select%2A> method selects multiple items of the <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect.Items%2A> collection.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect.Select%2A>方法會選取多個項目<xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect.Items%2A>集合。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the ordinal index of the selected item in an <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect" /> control.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect" /> 控制項中所選取項目的循序的索引。

trans-unit.source: The ordinal index of the selected item in an <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect" /> control.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect" /> 控制項中所選取項目的循序索引。

trans-unit.source: A value of <see langword="-1" /> indicates that no item is selected.
trans-unit.target: 值為 <see langword="-1" />，代表並沒有選取的項目。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect.SelectedIndex%2A> property is commonly used to determine the index of the selected item in a single-selection <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect> control.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect.SelectedIndex%2A>屬性通常用來決定選取的項目在單一選取的索引<xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect>控制項。

trans-unit.source: This index can then be used to retrieve the item from the <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect.Items%2A> collection.
trans-unit.target: 這個索引可以再用來擷取項目從<xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect.Items%2A>集合。

trans-unit.source: If the <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect.Multiple%2A> property is set to `true`, indicating that multiple items can be concurrently selected, the <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect.SelectedIndex%2A> property contains the index of the first selected item.
trans-unit.target: 如果<xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect.Multiple%2A>屬性設定為`true`，指出，可以同時選取多個項目，<xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect.SelectedIndex%2A>屬性包含的第一個選取的項目索引。

trans-unit.source: To determine the selected items from an <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect> control that allows multiple simultaneous selections, iterate through the <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect.Items%2A> collection and test the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListItem.Selected%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> property of each item.
trans-unit.target: 若要判斷選取的項目從<xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect>逐一查看控制項可讓多個同時選取項目，<xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect.Items%2A>收集和測試<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListItem.Selected%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>每個項目的屬性。

trans-unit.source: It is possible to have no item selected.
trans-unit.target: 很可能沒有任何選取的項目。

trans-unit.source: If no item is selected, the <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect.SelectedIndex%2A> property contains a value of `-1`.
trans-unit.target: 如果未不選取任何項目，則<xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect.SelectedIndex%2A>屬性包含值為`-1`。

trans-unit.source: This commonly occurs when the page first loads and an item is not selected by default.
trans-unit.target: 當第一次載入頁面，並依預設不會選取項目，就會發生這種常發生。

trans-unit.source: Provide code to test this value before referencing the item in the <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect.Items%2A> collection.
trans-unit.target: 提供程式碼以測試這個值在參考中的項目之前<xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect.Items%2A>集合。

trans-unit.source: Otherwise, an exception is thrown if the index is out of the range of the collection.
trans-unit.target: 否則，如果索引超出範圍的集合，會擲回例外狀況。

trans-unit.source: By default, the <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect> control is displayed as a drop-down list box.
trans-unit.target: 根據預設，<xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect>控制項顯示為下拉式清單方塊。

trans-unit.source: If you allow multiple selections (by setting the <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect.Multiple%2A> property to `true`) or specify a height greater than one row (by setting the <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect.Size%2A> property to a value greater than `1`), the control is displayed as a list box.
trans-unit.target: 如果您允許多重選取 (藉由設定<xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect.Multiple%2A>屬性`true`) 或指定大於一個資料列的高度 (藉由設定<xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect.Size%2A>屬性設為大於值`1`)，顯示為清單方塊控制項。

trans-unit.source: If a drop-down list box is displayed, an item is always selected.
trans-unit.target: 如果顯示下拉式清單方塊，會一律會選取項目。

trans-unit.source: If a list box is displayed, you can programmatically clear the selection from all items by setting the <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect.SelectedIndex%2A> property to `-1`.
trans-unit.target: 如果顯示清單方塊，您可以藉由設定，以程式設計方式清除所有項目選取項目<xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect.SelectedIndex%2A>屬性`-1`。

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates how to use the <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect.SelectedIndex%2A> property to determine the index of the selected item in the <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect> control.
trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用<xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect.SelectedIndex%2A>屬性來判斷在選取之項目的索引<xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect>控制項。

trans-unit.source: The index is then used to retrieve the selected item from the <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect.Items%2A> collection.
trans-unit.target: 然後使用索引來擷取選取的項目從<xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect.Items%2A>集合。

trans-unit.source: The property was set to a value greater than the number of items in the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect" /> control or less than <see langword="-1" />.
trans-unit.target: 屬性設定為大於 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect" /> 控制項中項目數的值，或小於 <see langword="-1" /> 的值。

trans-unit.source: Gets a collection that contains the zero-based indexes of all currently selected items in the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect" /> control.
trans-unit.target: 取得集合，其中包含 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect" /> 控制項中所有目前選取項目之以零起始的索引。

trans-unit.source: A collection that contains the zero-based indexes of all currently selected items in the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect" /> control.
trans-unit.target: 集合，其中包含 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect" /> 控制項中所有目前選取項目之以零起始的索引。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect.SelectedIndices%2A> property is used by the <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect> class to return a collection that contains the zero-based indexes of all currently selected items in the <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect> control.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect.SelectedIndices%2A>屬性供<xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect>類別，以傳回目前包含所有的以零為起始的索引集合中選取項目<xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect>控制項。

trans-unit.source: Control developers extending the functionality of the <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect> class can override the <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect.SelectedIndices%2A> property to provide a custom algorithm for returning currently selected items.
trans-unit.target: 控制擴充功能的開發人員<xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect>類別可以覆寫<xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect.SelectedIndices%2A>屬性來傳回目前選取的項目提供自訂的演算法。

trans-unit.source: Occurs when the selected items in the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect" /> control change between posts to the server.
trans-unit.target: 發生於 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect" /> 控制項中所選取的項目在發佈至伺服器期間時變更。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect.ServerChange> event is raised when the selected items in the <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect> control change between posts to the server.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect.ServerChange>就會引發事件時選取的項目中<xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect>控制發佈至伺服器之間的變更。

trans-unit.source: The control must have view state enabled for the <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect.ServerChange> event to work correctly.
trans-unit.target: 控制項必須具有啟用檢視狀態<xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect.ServerChange>事件才能正確運作。

trans-unit.source: For more information about handling events, see [NIB: Consuming Events](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67).
trans-unit.target: 如需處理事件的詳細資訊，請參閱[NIB： 使用事件](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67)。

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates how to specify and code an event handler declaratively for the <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect.ServerChange> event of the <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect> control.
trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼範例示範如何指定及程式碼的事件處理常式以宣告方式<xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect.ServerChange>事件<xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect>控制項。

trans-unit.source: The event handler determines whether the selected items are compatible with each other.
trans-unit.target: 此事件處理常式會判斷選取的項目是否彼此相容。

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates how to specify and code an event handler programmatically for the <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect.ServerChange> event of the <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect> control.
trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼範例示範如何指定及程式碼的事件處理常式以程式設計方式<xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect.ServerChange>事件<xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect>控制項。

trans-unit.source: The event handler determines whether the selected items are compatible with each other.
trans-unit.target: 此事件處理常式會判斷選取的項目是否彼此相容。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the height (in rows) of the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect" /> control.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect" /> 控制項的高度 (列數)。

trans-unit.source: The height (in rows) of the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect" /> control.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect" /> 控制項的高度 (列數)。

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect.Size%2A> property to specify the height (in rows) of the <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect> control.
trans-unit.target: 使用<xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect.Size%2A>屬性，以指定的高度 （以資料列）<xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect>控制項。

trans-unit.source: If you specify a size that is smaller than the number of items in the control, scroll bars are displayed to allow you to move up and down the list.
trans-unit.target: 如果您指定大小小於控制項中的項目數，捲軸會顯示可讓您在清單中上下移動。

trans-unit.source: By default, the <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect> control is displayed as a drop-down list box.
trans-unit.target: 根據預設，<xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect>控制項顯示為下拉式清單方塊。

trans-unit.source: If you allow multiple selections (by setting the <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect.Multiple%2A> property to `true`) or specify a height greater than one row (by setting the <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect.Size%2A> property to a value greater than `1`), the control is displayed as a list box.
trans-unit.target: 如果您允許多重選取 (藉由設定<xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect.Multiple%2A>屬性`true`) 或指定大於一個資料列的高度 (藉由設定<xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect.Size%2A>屬性設為大於值`1`)，顯示為清單方塊控制項。

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates how to use the <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect.Size%2A> property to specify the height (in rows) of the <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect> control.
trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用<xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect.Size%2A>屬性，以指定的高度 （以資料列）<xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect>控制項。

trans-unit.source: The key identifier for the control.
trans-unit.target: 控制項的索引鍵識別項。

trans-unit.source: The collection of all incoming name values.
trans-unit.target: 所有內送名稱值的集合。

trans-unit.source: For a description of this member, see <see cref="M:System.Web.UI.IPostBackDataHandler.LoadPostData(System.String,System.Collections.Specialized.NameValueCollection)" />.
trans-unit.target: 如需這個成員的說明，請參閱 <see cref="M:System.Web.UI.IPostBackDataHandler.LoadPostData(System.String,System.Collections.Specialized.NameValueCollection)" />。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect" /> control's state has changed as a result of a postback; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果回傳的結果改變了 <see langword="true" /> 控制項的狀態，則為 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect" />，否則為 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.target: 這個成員是明確介面成員實作，

trans-unit.target: 只有在 <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect> 執行個體轉換成 <xref:System.Web.UI.IPostBackDataHandler> 介面時，才能使用這個成員。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="P:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect.SelectedIndex" /> property was set to a value greater than the number of items in the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect" /> control or less than <see langword="-1" />.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="P:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect.SelectedIndex" /> 屬性設定為大於 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect" /> 控制項中項目數的值，或小於 <see langword="-1" /> 的值。

trans-unit.source: For a description of this member, see <see cref="M:System.Web.UI.IPostBackDataHandler.RaisePostDataChangedEvent" />.
trans-unit.target: 如需這個成員的說明，請參閱 <see cref="M:System.Web.UI.IPostBackDataHandler.RaisePostDataChangedEvent" />。

trans-unit.source: This member is an explicit interface member implementation.
trans-unit.target: 這個成員是明確介面成員實作，

trans-unit.source: It can be used only when the <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect> instance is cast to an <xref:System.Web.UI.IPostBackDataHandler> interface.
trans-unit.target: 只有在 <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect> 執行個體轉換成 <xref:System.Web.UI.IPostBackDataHandler> 介面時，才能使用這個成員。

trans-unit.source: Tracks view state changes to the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect" /> control so the changes can be stored in the control's <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.StateBag" /> object.
trans-unit.target: 追蹤 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect" /> 控制項的檢視狀態變更，讓變更能夠儲存在控制項的 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.StateBag" /> 物件中。

trans-unit.source: This object is accessible through the <see cref="P:System.Web.UI.Control.ViewState" /> property.
trans-unit.target: 這個物件可透過 <see cref="P:System.Web.UI.Control.ViewState" /> 屬性存取。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect.TrackViewState%2A> method persists items in the <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect.Items%2A> collection of the <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect> control to view state.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect.TrackViewState%2A>方法持續中的項目<xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect.Items%2A>集合<xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect>控制項來檢視狀態。

trans-unit.source: Gets the value of the selected item in the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect" /> control or sets the <see cref="P:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect.SelectedIndex" /> property of the control to the index of the first item in the list with the specified value.
trans-unit.target: 取得 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect" /> 控制項中所選取項目的值，或以指定的值將控制項的 <see cref="P:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect.SelectedIndex" /> 屬性設定為清單中第一個項目的索引。

trans-unit.source: The value of the selected item in the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect" /> control.
trans-unit.target: 在 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect" /> 控制項中選取項目的值。

trans-unit.source: If no item is selected in the control, <see cref="F:System.String.Empty" /> is returned.
trans-unit.target: 如果控制項中沒有選取的項目，則傳回 <see cref="F:System.String.Empty" />。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect.Value%2A> property is commonly used to get the value of the item referenced by the <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect.SelectedIndex%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect.Value%2A>屬性通常用來取得所參考之項目的值<xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect.SelectedIndex%2A>屬性。

trans-unit.source: If no item is selected in the control, <xref:System.String.Empty?displayProperty=nameWithType> is returned.
trans-unit.target: 如果控制項中沒有選取的項目，則傳回 <xref:System.String.Empty?displayProperty=nameWithType>。

trans-unit.source: If you set this property to a value, the <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect.SelectedIndex%2A> property is updated with the index of the first item in the list that contains that value.
trans-unit.target: 如果您設定此屬性的值，<xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect.SelectedIndex%2A>屬性會更新為包含該值的清單中第一個項目的索引。

trans-unit.source: If no matching value is found, the <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect.SelectedIndex%2A> property is left unchanged.
trans-unit.target: 如果不找到任何相符的值，<xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect.SelectedIndex%2A>屬性保留不變。

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates how to use the <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect.Value%2A> property to get the value of the selected item in the <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect> control.
trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用<xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect.Value%2A>屬性取得選取的項目中的值<xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect>控制項。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="P:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect.Value" /> property was set to an item greater than the number of items in the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect" /> control or less than <see langword="-1" />.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="P:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect.Value" /> 屬性設定為大於 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect" /> 控制項中項目數的項目，或小於 <see langword="-1" /> 的項目。
